title: Yugioh is more balanced than League right now and even Yugioh fixes their mistakes
body:
Sure, Rhongo Bongo is still a thing, but many of their combo pieces are nerfed. Most FTKs (First Turn Kills) are dead. Control decks will probably take over, but at least those don't kill you before you take a turn and Twin Twisters works very well into them.

Funny that Konami of America fixed their game by listening to their playerbase by banning Firewall Dragon. Imagine if Riot Games listened to the reasonable, most common complaints about League. Dark Harvest would have been hotfixed again so people could actually play. Nerfing continuously overpowered champions like Kai'sa might be nerfed instead of workarounds like nerfing the shit out of Rageblade, kinda like how A-Assault Core was limited to 1 instead of them banning Firewall Dragon.

But the worst part is now that Firewall Dragon is banned, A-Assault Core went back to 3 copies, but Riot Games, when they do eventually nerf Kai'sa, won't fix Rageblade.

replies.body: Was I supposed to understand a word of that?

Ok let me put it in an infographic format for you.

Last banlist: Firewall (Limited, 1 copy), A-Assault Core (Limited, 1 copy).
New banlist Firewall (Banned, 0 copies), A-Assault Core (Unlimited, 3 copies).

RIot Games:
RIght now: Kai'sa (broken), Rageblade (nerfed)
The future: Kai'sa (nerfed), Rageblade (still nerfed)

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

I know shit about Yugioh but you made it make sense somehow!

Nah man, it's Yugioh lingo, you need to realize Firewall is gone rejoice!!!!!!! NEW META WILL BE BORN! 

No more Firewall!!!! Noble Knights will be strong!!!!
Link summoning and a lot of the ridiculous stuff they added to yuigioh is what shat on it the most tbh

yeah yeah, haven't heard it before that *latest summoning mechanic* "ruined" the game.

meanwhile the NA playerbase is increasing.

Meanwhile, ever since Konami didn't listen to thousands of players to step in for DN and prevent them from being shut down -- they lost more players than they can ever recover over even a decade.

It took a heavy loss for Konami learning to listen about Yugioh. Riot hasn't suffered a significant one to learn from, most people still play the game and buy skins, ergo -- not too much is going wrong in the books for them to sharply change.

> [{quoted}](name=Qrown,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sjoG1IYe,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-12-03T00:55:58.715+0000)

Your second statement is wrong, NA and Europe has lost a significant number of players but Riot doesn't care due to what they earn from Asia during worlds.  Skin sales and such are down a major number but profit from worlds viewers are up more then the skin sales dropped.  Riot only cares about the LCS viewers now and not the players.
really ? the player base in Germany is near dead

I personally love what links do for the game, but the power level of some link monsters is just far too high. Cards like Firewall, gumblar, summon sorc, etc just should never have made it past RnD, but they end up being printed, and stay legal for months on end
Link sum did NOT ruin anything, Pendulum is BS !!!
Yugioh is the shit, don't talk shit.

-Implying yugioh has been balanced since before the introduction of pendulums

you okay there op?
**[ Laughs in Mad Scientist and Catapult Turtle ]**

Yugioh has never been balanced.
They ban cards based on the next ridiculous link mechanic.

Hapoened with dark armed dragon.
It happened with heroes.
Hapoened with gladiator beasts.

Problem with yugioh is that it has been powercreeped into oblivion, when you compare it to the old vanilla game.

Sadly same thing is happening with league, look at the new reworks/champs compared to old ones.

Kai'Sa is trash now.

Irelia
Jax
Akali
Pyke
Thresh
Lucian

There's what needs nerfing.

You might aswell apply for Riot gems you are on the level of balance team

> Kai'Sa is trash now.

#40% pickrate

Right, only after months and months of the most degenerate, unenjoyable, ftk format that Yugioh has ever seen.

I love Yugioh and Konami, and I'm thankful as all hell for the recent banlist, and I won't deny that convincing Japan to let us ban Firewall was probably a Herculean feat by Konami of America. But Dark Harvest could do triple the damage it does right now and League still wouldn't be in as bad of a state as Yugioh was in for the majority of this year.

Man the brazen audacity on this guy! Not too long ago link summoning wasn't even a thing and Yu-gi-oh laughed in the face of balance and called it its female dog. Today we have someone with the outright audacity to brag about 1 single patch a day after its released. You know dang well, a year from now which side will be back to its old FTK ways so I don't blame you for having your fun now.

Konami knows just how much money they make from broken formats in which its ridiculously loyal fanbase continues to play and they will revert back within a year. And you know why the fanbase is so loyal? Because that's how they make their money.

actually konami is only getting a new playerbase because the game has pretty much slowed down quite a bit, they are learning that people enjoy a longer game that they can enjoy and not a oneshot fuckfest.
LUL IMAGINE PRAISING KONAMI IN 2k18
Yeah, but it took them over a year to ban firewall and link spam decks can still gumblar you for 4 turn 1

While I do agree that LEAGUE OF LEGENDS is at gargbage state. Infact it is since 2013 or something.
While I do agree that KAISA HAS BEEN FKING BROKEN SINCE RELEASE and Riot Should be fired balance team didnt adress that

Konami also sucks at balancing / keeping the game way fun

I have 2 diff decks which spam Rhongo

Six sams (Consistency goes up if needlefiber / invoker ever come) and no you dont have to draw gateway fk you dont even need six sam link most of a time
PK Dark Warrior rhongo (Consitency only goes up if Cherubini ever comes)

There are still many degenerate cards in a game which need to be banned, and need adressing in advance
Rhongo - Negates Turns. BAN HIM
Utopic Zexal- Negates turns (Wind ups, Raidraptors and perhaps few others can pull this off). BAN HIM and we can get RUM cards back
Kristya, And that Coinflip negature turn Fairy ban EM - This bitch is just dumb card and entire fairy type suffers because of her. BAN HER
True king of all callamities - Skill drain, attribute mind and soul drain, waboku, extender, attribute manipulator WHAT AN actual fk is this card. Lito back
Soul charge needs to be banned
Gumblar dragon needs an Axe
Tomahawk needs an axe- Bring back all dragon rules after, their endphase plus card Super Reju can be unlimited (ENDPHASE omegalul)
Gallenduo needs an axe because of SSORC
Lapis lazuli needs a bann (Master diamond can be at 3 if Calamity is gone)


Naturia beast is still on a ban worthy side (Not as much as above cards, specially given how many foolish monsters we have)

Vanity/Majesty fiend - Should have been at 1 ages ago. Specially now that Dangers/PK can randomly sidedeck vommit this cards
Gozen, rivarly, lose 1 turn.  - need to go to 1 
Fk hit Artifact sanctum at 2 because scythe is another dumb low IQ strategy



Lots of archetypes can come back
Ban Unicore and Entire Nekroz (Apart from DJINN) can come back
Shadoll Construct can come back at 19
Stratos can come back at 19
Cannahawk can come back at 3 (Every deck is solitaire anyways)
Scout can come back at 3
Card destruction can be at 3 (WE HAVE HANDTRAPS HELP ME DRAW EM YES)
Monster gate and reasoning can be at 3 (because at that point you can hit handtraps)
Raigeki and dark hole can be at 19
Heavy storm and duster can be at 19
Book of mmon can be at 19
Interrupted Kaiju slumber can be at 2
Super poly can be at 2
Gateway can be at 3 (I main six sams, the worse six sam player you are the more you need gateway but the card is unessesary)
Set Rotation can be at 2
Draco faceoff can be at 2 (And people still wont play it to turbo out electrum since there are better cards which do that)
As much as I hate monarchs if you hit vanity and majesty fiend most of their cards can come to 3 
Final countdown can come to 19
Exciton can come back to 3 
Dewloren can come back to 112931839
Spyral Gear drone can come back at 3
Deep sea diva can come back at 3 (Neptabyss is more resiliant normal summon)
Morphing jar can come back at 3 (That whole Jar draw turbo just loses to handtraps so none cares)
Night assailant can come back at 3
All Inzektors can come back at 3
Tour guide can come at multiple even 3 (This card is so weak at handtraps, entire BA can flop if it gets handtraped)
Fk Put BA at full Power the deck aint cancerous like most of decks
Terrortop should be either at 1-2 (We dont have cherubini / invoker its perfect time to have him at 2)
Damage juggler can come back at 3 
Not really sure about Infernities
Not really sure about gishkis (due to handloops)
Dark armed dragon can come back at 19
Pre mature burial deserves to be back in place of soul charge (such a nostalgic card)
Snatch steal can come back at 1991923839123 (Useless only good going second, SO OVERHYPED handtraps are better)
Spellbook of judgment can come back at 3 (OMEGALUL ENDPHASE PLUSING)
Pot of avarice can be at 19
Zenmaity with Rhongo and Zexal ban can come back
Denglong can come back if we ban herald
Starving venom can come back if we ban that Random winged beast card none wants to play
Pendulums can come at higher numbers (I only want for Kirin and double iris to stay at banlist)
Substitoad can come back at 3
Yata garasu can come back at 19
Dandy can come to 1 at tcg but hit other plant cards such as lonefire and scorpio (OCG banlist is better there)
Tribe infecting virus can come at 19
Makayura can come 
Time seal can come back at 3


Malicious is at 2 can be at 3 if we put (Grepher, isolde, vyon and keep arma at 1, I would prefer mali at 3)
Limiter can be at 19
Scapeagoat can be at 19 (SERIOUSLY this is table 500 card, TURN 2 OMEGALUL)

Either Bring back invoker (Ban archer) or Terrortop and Zoo cards can be at higher ammount

Raigeki and dark hole can be at 19

Would prefer if Infernoids weren't the best deck.
Dark Hole and Raigeki should only be at 1. Board wipes are actually a bad design in card games because they ignore card advantage.

> Set Rotation can be at 2

you mean banned because stops multiple decks from operating at all (trickstars anyone?)

> Tour guide can come at multiple even 3 (This card is so weak at handtraps, entire BA can flop if it gets handtraped)

BA is still topping regionals right now. Maybe 2 if they wanted to push BA, but not 3.

> Terrortop should be either at 1-2 (We dont have cherubini / invoker its perfect time to have him at 2)

Those cards will come evenutally. Just errata Terrortop to "cannot be used as Xyz or Link Material, except for the summon of a WIND monster).

uhh why?

> Scapeagoat can be at 19 (SERIOUSLY this is table 500 card, TURN 2 OMEGALUL)

Unicore is aids. There is barely any diff between rhongo and unicore. Unicore does what Rhongo does 90% of a time
If you put unicore at 1 he is tehnicly at higher count because he is massively searchable and other Nekroz cards protect this massive floodgate

We are in extra deck era. Perhaps next era wont require extra deck then unicore can be at 3. 
Would threat the shadd winda the same way but shaddolls are way weaker 

> Artifacts aren't played.

Sanctum is better Dbarrier. I dont like losing to a single fking trap going second with 80% of decks
So a semi limit

The fact that traptrick and that lair of darkness monster search it is fking annoying

>

True they both buff noids but I personaly find noids fine. If you are running 3 mgate and 3 reasoning you cant really run handtraps


Raigeki is bad since roughly 2015 apart from Zoo format

Both raigeki and dark hole do nothing going first (except for some table 500 yangzing dark hole stuff)
They are only good going second so they are ment to be powerfull

Evenly matched is better then both Raigeki, Dark hole, Storm, duster
The only problem with those 4 cards is that they are **lazy why would You innovate simple side ins** 
so I personaly dont mind if they stay at limited


> you mean banned because stops multiple decks from operating at all (trickstars anyone?)

Oh shit a Fieldspell floodgate. How can you even compare that to skill drain, lose 1 turn you cant
real floodgates laugh to fieldspell floodgate, wouldnt trickstars run set rotation at multiples anyway... they would 
If anything it buffs trickstars.

> BA is still topping regionals right now. Maybe 2 if they wanted to push BA, but not 3.

BA is not aids deck so it can be at full power. There is no BA card which says you cant yugioh
At most deck does Beatrice + fairy tail snow +  topologic tris 
They lost malicious so they cant do that anyway

Graf being at 1 makes no sense since soon you ll want to access it from deck anyway off a cherubini
Cir being at 1 makes no sense because thats all you usually need
Now beatrice going to higher count does matter but past turn 1 only so w/e

Tourguide is so fragile, Ash, veiler, impermanence on it can negate their entire turn
BA players always sweat when they open with tourguide specially if they dont have some danger! boys or that mill summon bird

Sorry dude but do you consider yourself a good yugioh player?

 The card is to slow hitting it hits unskilled players (Stun players) so I dont mind it at 2 per say but the card is weak

> Unicore is aids. There is barely any diff between rhongo and unicore. Unicore does what Rhongo does 90% of a time
If you put unicore at 1 he is tehnicly at higher count because he is massively searchable and other Nekroz cards protect this massive floodgate

Are you sure ?
the reason why I'm enjoying League metas more , because they can't be even compared to Yugioh
Yugioh's current meta is much worse
you can't win with a non-meta deck against a meta deck , at least , in League you still have a chance of out playing a Zed as a Lux , in Yugioh , you can't win with old school decks against new meta ones.

I stopped playing around the  time Monarchs became a thing again in the Pendulum era. Tried again during the time Spyrals were the top deck, and I really enjoyed Trickstars.

But my true love will always be Synchro decks.
I actually enjoyed connecting synchro and xyz in one deck so that I could counter a lot of things.

if you want to give it a try, there's an app that's not Duel Links but I can't remember the name.  duel Links is for fast-paced, custom rule games

the other app isn't that great either though and takes forever to get any cards

if you have an android emulator or a smart phone, you can play free

Lmao !!! I can't stop reading this, Yugioh better than League. 

All I play is Yugioh. xD

yesterday i read a thread (cant find it) where s1 "exposed" a rioter who made a tweet (and deleted it 1 hour after that) saying that the boards are super toxic and ppl dont know what they are talking about thats why he completely ignores the boards.
idk in what team this guy works, but imagine he is a game balancer. 
that would literally confirm and explain why riot ignored us for like 3 years in a row 
now.



and you can easily add to the example. im sure a lot of people played runescape. like over 80% of the playerbase gave them shit when they showed the "rs3" update. jagex didnt listen, made the update go live and they regret it to this day. they lost over 50% of their playerbase FOREVER.
even with "oldschool runescape" which are extra servers where the game is like it was in 2004(i think thats the year?) they didnt recover. sure a ton of people came back to osrs, but a majority of their playerbase never returned.
this is exactly what should happen to riot. for the sake of the people who love this game like i sadly do.

Eh Dark harvest just needs to be tweaked. The problem is that it's much stronger the more you have on a team. This means that it needs to have its cd reset nerfed or have a per-target cd, but doing that means that other players don't get to use their keystone so that's not going to happen.

Kaisa is fine at the moment and rageblade is also fine as it benefits most of the users it's intended for, and arguably better if they deal any magic damage due to the natural of magic resist not scaling.

The real problem is abominations like Irelia, Akali, and LB still haven't been hit significantly. Akali is over 80% banrate across all regions so she'll be hit next patch as scheduled. This is preseason. Shit is supposed to be tumultuous because Riot is making large sweeping changes.
